text: aur he eemaan vaalo! unhen bura na kaho, jin (moortiyon) ko ve allaah ke siva pukaarate hain. anyatha, ve log agyaanata ke kaaran ati karake allaah ko bura kahenge. isee prakaar, hamane pratyek samudaay ke lie unake karm ko sushobhit bana diya hai. phir unake paalanahaar kee or hee unhen jaana hai. to unhen bata dega, jo ve karate rahe
